10.eng-name: The Book of Leading the Prayer (Al-Imamah)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Hisham bin 'Urwah from his father that 'Abdullih bin Arqam used to lead his companions in prayer. The time for prayer came one day and he went to relieve himself then he came back and said:"I heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) say: 'If any one of you feels the need to defecate, let him do that first, before he prays

chapter.eng-name: Excuse for not praying in the congregation
